title: Registration
description: Pick up your badge and convention materials

title: Vendor Hall
description: Shop for all your favorite pony merchandise!

title: The Good, The Bad, & The Pony With The Party Cannon
description: Wanna watch a crazy storytelling game? This is the place for that! Watch the almighty D20 influence just how crazy of a pony story we wind up with as Dewie and the other panelists must work together to tell one crazy story after the next, all influenced by the D20!

title: Why Adults Enjoy Ponies aka Brony Church
description: Do you want to know why you go to a MLP Convention as an Adult? I'm here to show you how much the show has reminded you of lessons you may have forgotten.

title: Who is Best Pony?
description: We've been arguing for over a decade, so it is time for HarmonyCon to decide who is the best MLP character! Your vote in this 64-character tournament helps decide the winner!

title: Kandi/Friendship Bracelet Making
description: Hey Parents of Lil Kids!!!!! Bring your kiddos by to make some Kandi/Friendship bracelets! All supplies will be provided so stop on by!

title: Buckball Tournament
description: Official Buckball Tournament. Bring a team, join a team, or cheer them on. Fun for all skill levels. No experience needed. Medals awarded to the top teams! Fun had by all!

title: Autographs for all VIPs
description: Autographs for all VIPs

title: HarmonyCon Talent Show
description: Show off your skills at Harmonycon's first ever Talent Show! Whether you sing, dance, play an instrument, or have a unique talent, this is your opportunity to shine on stage. Support your fellow con goers while they perform in front of our panel of judges! Enjoy an afternoon of amazing performances that highlight the diverse talents of our fandom!

title: Talking Points is Magic
description: Come have some fun as we gather to play the Jackbox game "Talking Points." Come watch people give speeches about ponies but they have no idea what the slides will be. Hilarity is bound to happen when nobody knows what's coming next, least of all the speechmaker

title: Modern Brony Music
description: There's so much fandom music getting released every day! With many new songs frequently appearing, it can be difficult to keep up and know what to listen to! Come participate as we show you the different resources you can use to find your new favorite fandom tunes and help us pick out which songs we listen to during the panel!

title: PowerPoint Pony Party
description: A bunch of informative and curated PowerPoints being presented by a very NOT informative cast of silly horse people.

title: DIY Badge Exchange
description: Have you ever wanted a badge of your OC or wanted to add another one to your collection? Come to the DIY Badge Exchange where you'll be randomly assigned to draw an attendee's badge and exchange them at the end! Supplies will be provided and all art skill levels welcome.

title: After the Fact Live! Swarm of the Century
description: It's everypony for themselves as the Parasprites roll into town! Join Silver Quill for a look at this season one episode. Expect gags, quips, and maybe a moment of insight. Q&A to follow after the presentation!

title: If You Get a Question Wrong, a Panelist Leaves
description: A trivia game with the highest stakes of any other My Little Pony convention panel: If any questions are answered incorrectly, a panelist will leave.

title: How to fix Ponies with iPhones
description: Do you hate the idea of ponies with iphones? Tablets? Social media? Not after this panel you won't. ;)

title: Coltchella Musicians Meet & Greet
description: Come meet the Coltchella musicians!

title: Bronies Remember
description: Join Zenith and Onyx on a fun and nostalgia-driven trip down FiM memory lane!

title: Science Fiction, Cyberpunk, Ponies and You - Sunjackers Panel
description: CaptainHoers talks about his longrunning Sunjackers comic, cyberpunk as a genre more generally, and why even get in your perfectly good ponies in the first place. Live video essay.

title: Pony the Interruption
description: Based on the ESPN show "Pardon the Interruption," the audience decides what we discuss! Drawing from cards with subjects the crowd writes down, we will take turns drawing at random of all sorts of horse subjects to discuss. Once we select a subject, we set a timer for three minutes and spend that time discussing the topic. Once the timer goes off, we stop and draw again. Lather, rinse, repeat!

title: Closing Ceremonies
description: Final convention event

title: Player's Choice
description: PIck one of the above RPGs or another from The File Of Good Stuff

title: Unbound RPG
description: A roleplaying game with a twist: the players and the gm create the world, the plot, and the adversaries during character creation.

title: Mario Party Jamboree
description: Play among multiple boards in a 4 player free for all, playing minigames and rolling dice to purchase stars and come on up top in the newest game in the series!

title: Player's Choice #2
description: Choose anything in my collection you'd like to try and we'll play it together!
